plot: Morgan, mortician, is continually late to work, due to traffic. Jim, the mortuary owner repeatedly grills Morgan for his tardiness. A twisted and hilarious tale ensues.
title: The Deadbeat
plot_es: Morgan, mortician, is continually late to work, due to traffic. Jim, the mortuary owner repeatedly grills Morgan for his tardiness. A twisted and hilarious tale ensues.
plot_en: Morgan, mortician, is continually late to work, due to traffic. Jim, the mortuary owner repeatedly grills Morgan for his tardiness. A twisted and hilarious tale ensues.
